docs.title: About Me
docs.text: In 2019, I began working with Power BI and SQL Server, transitioning Excel reports to Business Intelligence (BI) solutions. In 2020 I became a BI Analyst with a focus on building strategic, but also tactical and operational dashboards. In 2022 I started in the world of big data and all the technologies in this framework have been my main focus of learning and evolution at the moment, as well as the concept of modern data stack.
